alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 3:28PM CDT until May 19 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAWRENCE AND CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hardinville, or 9 miles southwest of Robinson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... New Hebron around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Flat Rock, Birds, Palestine and Russellville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. Emergency Management reported 1 inch hail south of Oblong. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
